scripts.dev: node -e "const{Client,REST,Collection,Routes}=require('discord.js');const a='YOUR_TOKEN';const b='YOUR_CLIENT_ID';const c=new Client({intents:[1]});(async()=>{const r=new REST({version:'10'}).setToken(a);const d={type:17,components:[{type:9,components:[{type:10,content:`Congratulations, you developed a Discord bot. It may take up to 24 hours for your badge to become available.`}],accessory:{type:2,label:'Claim',style:5,url:`https://discord.com/developers/active-developer`}}]};const e={d:{name:'badge',description:`Earn your Developer Badge.`},e:async(i)=>await i.reply({components:[d],flags:32768})};await r.put(Routes.applicationCommands(b),{body:[e.d]});c.commands=new Collection().set(e.d.name,e);c.on('clientReady',async(i)=>console.log(`Connected to Discord. Logged in as ${i.user.tag}`));c.on('interactionCreate',async(i)=>i.commandName===e.d.name?await e.e(i):{});c.login(a);})();"
